ModSettings.name: Dwarven Engineer Mod
ModSettings.title: [Unit] Dwarven Engineer Mod
ModSettings.description:
Dwarven Engineer Mod
This is a fix to the Dwarven Engineer construction rate.
In the original - "The Dwarves have a racial advantage that allows them to construct roads at twice the normal rate. This allows Dwarven Engineer to quickly form a network of Roads across their entire empire." (see - https://masterofmagic.fandom.com/wiki/Roads)
However, this feature was overlooked in the current remake and the Dwarven Engineer receives no road building construction bonus. To address, this Mod attempts to correct the oversight.
The Dwarven Engineer is assigned a unique DWARVEN_ENGINEER_SKILL that allows it to complete road construction at double the normal rate.
ModSettings.author: DorianGray
